attributes.action: Support for University students and amend the structure of courses going forward
attributes.additional_details:
Provide technology funding for computerss etc.
Ensure students grades are not impacted from reduced face to face classes. 
Provide funding for students to ensure childcare is possible while studying.
attributes.background: Provide guidance and financial support for University students who lack the materials to be able to study from home and study independently.

rejection.details:
The structure of University courses would be a matter for individual institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302855

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to make funding available for computer equipment and other resources, if this is something you would like to happen.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
